title: What Cigar Brands Most Impacted the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
itunes:title: What Cigar Brands Most Impacted the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
description:
Which brands have had the most impact on the cigar industry? We talk about specific brands and why we believe they were impactful.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
